Name: Gold Miner
About the game: The Gold Miner is a puzzle game. The goal of the game is to collect all nuggets and jewels in the level and avoid barrels with gunpowder. Collect gems, score points, upgrade your equipment! Try to complete all 20 levels as soon as possible, will you succeed ?! Game features: - PC controls: Keyboard/Mouse. - 20 levels - Game shop - Nice music Made in Construct 2. Enjoy the games!
